Text.name: Text0
Text.content:
Congratulations!

Now you know the basics of how to manage contents in OpenCms. Of course, there are many more possibilities. OpenCms is a full featured website CMS that allows creation of the most demanding websites.

Click on any of the boxes below to continue exploring

The Release Notes contain information about what is new in this OpenCms release. Our Documentation contains in depth information about how to manage and develop websites with OpenCms.

We recommend you start with the OpenCms Demo Website, which provides a full featured, nice looking example based on the Apollo Template.

Of particular interest in the demo may be the Element pages section. Here you get an overview about all the content types available with the Apollo template.
